name: submission_custom_grade_status
definition: The event gets emitted when a custom status is removed or applied to a student's submission.
trigger: Triggered when a custom status is applied or removed from a student's submission.

schema.assignment_id: The Canvas ID of the assignment.
schema.submission_id: The Canvas ID of the submission_id.
schema.user_id: The Canvas user ID of the student.
schema.course_id: The Canvas ID of the course.
schema.submission_status: The new custom status name applied to a user's submission
schema.submission_status_id: The new custom status ID applied to a user's submission
schema.old_submission_status: The previous custom status name applied to a user's submission, if applicable
schema.old_submission_status_id: The previous custom status ID applied to a user's submission, if applicable
schema.updated_at: The time when the custom status was applied.

metadata.user_agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Macintosh; Intel Mac OS X 10_14_3) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/73.0.3683.103 Safari/537.36
